recruitment.title: Local recruitment
recruitment.description: Are you a young graduate in digital or engineering fields? Apply for an internship with us

quickInfos.title: companyViene
quickInfos.description: We simplify your business through engineering and digitalisation.

digitalisation.title: Digitalization, Digital Transformation & Digital Design
digitalisation.description: Digital tools offer tremendous possibilities in improving processes across all business sectors. CompanyViene, through its VieneDesign service, offers to support you in your digital transformation, while taking care of data protection and cybersecurity aspects.

optimisation.title: Process Management Optimization (As-Is â†’ To-be)
optimisation.description: CompanyViene in this service proposes to support you in establishing a schematic state of existing Processes (AS-IS), which paves the way for a second stage of optimized, high value-added and simplified proposals (TO-BE).

durabilite.title: Sustainability & circular economies
durabilite.description: CompanyViene can help you measure and reduce your environmental impact by offering digital tools and solutions. This service also enables us to integrate the pillars of sustainability (environmental, economic and social) into our proposals, so that you can create sustainable, recyclable or reusable products.

performance.title: Energy performance of buildings
performance.description: Thanks to the VieneHouse service, CompanyViene can help you control consumption by integrating passive cooling concepts, enabling you to save up to 30% of your consumption due to the cooling needs of living spaces.

energie.title: Energy & Utilities - Electricity/Water/Gas
energie.description: CompanyViene offers support in the areas of energy, water and their efficient use. CompanyViene offers studies and solutions on the use of fossil fuels, combined with new renewable resources. EnerViene also offers analyses of the outlook for market needs.

hero.title: Learn more about
hero.description: CompanyViene is a company whose partners are engineers, IT specialists, and experts in various engineering fields with extensive international experience in the new technologies sector. Our partners are spread across a wide network of experts in France, Belgium, Gabon, Equatorial Guinea, Central African Republic, Cameroon, Congo, Senegal, and DRC.

objectives.title: Our
objectives.description: To provide our customers with simple, optimal solutions in terms of sustainability, to improve service quality. The solutions offered by CompanyViene are designed to be practical, tailored, customisable and SMART. Our ambition is to add value by recruiting and training local staff, while drawing on expertise consolidated at international level.

development.title: Human Development
development.description: At the heart of CompanyViene's vision, the actions and undertakings initiated by the holding company are aimed at sustainably improving the well-being and fulfilment of individuals in their social environment through ingenious solutions with high added value.

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.description: Inspired by systems that are widespread in most developing countries, Sharing is a way of working that enables a group of individuals to improve their living conditions through a better distribution of available goods.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: The solutions offered by CompanyViene aim to be usable by all social classes. To achieve this, simplicity is one of CompanyViene's fundamental principles, enabling it to widen the scope of users of its products and services as much as possible.

equity.title: Equity
equity.description: Each shareholder of CompanyViene is an equal owner of the holding company. However, certain service providers may be involved at specific levels to provide us with their expertise. Equity is a sustainable model on which CompanyViene bases its positive impact on its customers.

profitability.title: Profitability
profitability.description: The search for profits and growth are essential to our investment and development strategies. CompanyViene aims to expand geographically, setting up operations in several target countries and creating value and jobs locally.

vieneEngineering.title: VieneEngineering
vieneEngineering.description: VieneEngineering is the Design Office of CompanyViene Holding. It brings together a vast network of engineers, computer scientists and technicians with specialisations in various sectors and professional experience in major international companies.
vieneEngineering.strategy: VieneEngineering's strategy can be described in 3 main stages:
steps: In a second step, a detailed analysis of solutions is carried out (Proof of Validation) and KPIs are implemented
The third and final step consists of implementing Solutions adapted according to the filter of services and products in our portfolio (E-To-Be Customization)
vieneEngineering.conclusion: This final step can also lead to the implementation of innovative and digital solutions.

vieneBusiness.title: VieneBusiness
vieneBusiness.description: VieneBusiness is the financing and project management structure in which CompanyViene is involved in the co-development of solutions and products in partnership with external players. It provides project leaders with real added value in the new technologies sector with support in terms of management, expertise and project financing.
vieneBusiness.additional: VieneBusiness is also responsible for implementing CompanyViene's CSR policy. The platform is responsible for managing donations and support for the most vulnerable. It enables CompanyViene's vision to be implemented on the basis of its 5 pillars: human development, sharing, simplicity, equity and profitability.

hero.title: Discover
hero.description: CompanyViene is positioned as a supplier of products and services designed to optimise and simplify its customers' management protocols.

VieneRegister.title: VieneRegister
VieneRegister.subtitle: Revolutionize Workforce Management with QR Code Technology
VieneRegister.description: Developed by CompanyViene, VieneRegister is an innovative Android mobile application that radically transforms organization member management. Through its advanced QR Code technology and secure database, it fully digitalizes registration, tracking, and validation processes to deliver unprecedented operational efficiency.

servicesList.title: Unique QR Code Identification
items: Automatic generation of personalized identification QR codes for each member.
Instant scanning for quick access to information and identity validation.
Complete traceability of interactions and consultations.

servicesList.title: Advanced Permission Management
items: Role and functionality assignment according to organizational hierarchy.
Granular access control (registration, validation, consultation, extraction).
Customizable workflow according to organization-specific needs.

servicesList.title: Secure Database
items: Secure cloud storage with sensitive data encryption.
Automatic backup and real-time synchronization.
Compliance with personal data protection standards.

servicesList.title: Integrated Management Tools
items: Payment validation and financial transaction tracking.
Automatic data extraction to Excel files for reporting.
Printing of identification cards and official receipts.

servicesList.title: Multi-Sector Adaptability
items: Flexible configuration for education, inventory management, or business processes.
Customizable interface according to industry sector.
Scalability to adapt to your organization's growth.

features: Intuitive mobile interface designed for immediate adoption by all users, reducing training costs.
Robust and scalable architecture enabling adaptation to specific needs and organizational growth.
Sophisticated permission system ensuring data security and compliance with internal procedures.
Reliable QR Code technology ensuring fast and error-free validation processes.
benefits: Educational Institutions: Complete digitalization of student management and drastic reduction of administrative tasks
Businesses: Personnel management optimization and improved process traceability
Managers: Total operational control with automated reporting and real-time monitoring
VieneRegister.useCases: Initially designed for education, VieneRegister adapts perfectly to inventory management, access control, event management, and any process requiring identification and tracking.

DoctoViene.title: DoctoViene
DoctoViene.subtitle: Revolutionising healthcare management through digitisation
DoctoViene.description: Developed by CompanyViene, DoctoViene is an innovative application designed to optimise the healthcare sector. Its aim is to digitise the healthcare process and improve the efficiency of healthcare professionals, thereby reducing the time spent on care.

servicesList.title: Document security
items: Digitisation and archiving of birth certificates, medical certificates, etc.
QR code for document authentication.

servicesList.title: Healthcare Act Management
items: Sharing and archiving medical procedures.
Real-time visibility for health insurance organisations.

servicesList.title: Digital Archiving
items: Preservation of birth documents against deterioration.
Instant search of scanned documents.

servicesList.title: Patient Management
items: Quick registration of patient information.
Accessible medical history and instant updates.

servicesList.title: Occupational medicine
items: Queue management and patient care.
View and print medical certificates.

benefits: Healthcare professionals: Intuitive interface for simplified management
Patients : Improving care and reducing costs

ArchiViene.title: ArchiViene
ArchiViene.subtitle: Revolutionize Document Management with Artificial Intelligence
ArchiViene.description: Developed by CompanyViene, ArchiViene is an intelligent digital archiving solution that radically transforms document management for administrations and businesses. With its embedded Artificial Intelligence and advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology, it enables digitization, analysis, automatic classification, and instant search of all types of documents from a simple photo.

servicesList.title: Intelligent Digitization
items: Automatic conversion of paper documents to high-quality digital format.
Multi-language OCR recognition with optimized image processing.
Support for all document formats (A4, A3, cards, invoices, contracts...).

servicesList.title: AI-Powered Automatic Classification
items: Intelligent content analysis for automatic categorization.
Automatic detection of document types (invoices, contracts, certificates...).
Automatic metadata indexing for optimized search.

servicesList.title: Instant Search
items: Ultra-fast full-text search engine across all archived documents.
Search by keywords, dates, references, or specific content.
Advanced filters to refine results according to your criteria.

servicesList.title: Security and Traceability
items: Data encryption and secure access with user rights management.
Complete history of consultations and modifications.
Automatic backup and data redundancy.

servicesList.title: Integration and Mobility
items: Web and mobile interface for universal access to archives.
API for integration with your existing systems (ERP, CRM...).
High-performance specialized scanners available as an option.

features: Intuitive interface designed for immediate adoption by administrative teams, drastically reducing training time.
Robust cloud architecture ensuring 24/7 availability and scalability according to your organizational needs.
Compliance with security and data protection standards to meet regulatory requirements.
Cutting-edge technology combining ease of use and processing power to optimize your services' productivity.
benefits: Administrative Services: Considerable time savings and improved operational efficiency
Management: Reduced physical storage costs and improved document traceability
Users: Instant access to information and elimination of tedious manual searches
ArchiViene.optionalEquipment: Latest generation professional scanners can be provided as an option to optimize the digitization process and guarantee exceptional image quality.

vieneDesign.title: VieneDesign
descriptions: In a world where brand image determines commercial success, VieneDesign transforms your ideas into powerful visual identities that leave lasting impressions and generate results.

Backed by the international expertise of our creative and technical teams, VieneDesign offers a comprehensive digital service that combines creative excellence, technological innovation, and marketing strategy to propel your business to new heights.
What are VieneDesign's areas of expertise?
features: Complete Visual Identity: Creation of unique graphic charters, memorable logos, and branding elements that perfectly reflect your company values.
Advanced Digital Design: Web and mobile application design with focus on user experience (UX/UI) to maximize engagement and conversion.
Impactful Visual Communication: Development of catalogs, advertising materials, and visual campaigns that capture attention and drive sales.
UX Research & Strategy: User behavioral analysis and journey optimization to significantly improve digital performance.
Custom Creative Solutions: Personalized support from conceptualization to implementation, adapted to your industry's specific requirements.
otherDescriptions: With VieneDesign, benefit from exceptional value for money through our international collaborative approach, which guarantees world-class creations adapted to your budget and growth ambitions.

enerViene.title: EnerViene
descriptions: Energy is at the heart of national security and economic development. Without it, vital sectors such as agriculture, transport, health and education can come to a standstill.
EnerViene offers innovative, tailor-made solutions for energy and utilities (water, gas).
features: Consulting and support: Expertise in the production, transport and distribution of energy and utilities (water, gas).
Customised solutions: Solutions tailored to the needs of public and private players, as well as residential applications for users.
Cutting-edge technologies: Support for decentralisation strategies and integration of new technologies.
otherDescriptions: EnerViene is your ally in ensuring the efficient and sustainable management of energy, essential to the prosperity of all sectors.

description: Our team is here to help you and will get back to you as soon as possible.
You can also find us on social media or visit our office at the address below.

success.description: We have received your message and will get back to you as soon as possible.

privacy.title: Our
privacy.description: At CompanyViene, we attach great importance to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy tells you how we handle your information.

sections.title: Object
content: CompanyViene invites you to read these general conditions for use of the www.companyviene.com website and related services carefully.
The term "Services" refers to any content accessible via the Internet Protocol.
The term "user" or "users" refers to any person who accesses this website.
By accessing the www.companyviene.com website, users agree to these general terms and conditions of use.

sections.title: Publisher
content: The www.companyviene.com website is published by :
COMPANYVIENE SARL, Capital of 1.000.000 F CFA, Registered office established at Akounam 2 in Owendo, Telephone: +241 (0)77 91 98 82, Libreville - GABON.
The company is represented by NDONG Moctar Gaye and ADOGHE NDONG Landry.
The www.companyviene.com website is hosted by PLANETHOSTER Inc. located at 4416 Louis B., Montreal, Canada. Mayer, Laval (Quebec) H7P 0G1, Canada.

sections.title: Access to the website
content: Any User with Internet access may access the Site free of charge. The cost of access (Internet connection, computer equipment, etc.) is borne by the User.
Access to all or part of the Website or the associated services is subject to payment or free of charge. Such access is either free or subject to prior registration.

The website and its various services may be interrupted or suspended by CompanyViene, in particular for maintenance purposes, without any obligation to give prior notice or justification. The User may not claim any compensation.
CompanyViene cannot be held responsible for any force majeure event resulting in network malfunction.
Users may contact the site at the following address: info@companyviene.com.

sections.title: Responsibility of the User
content: The User is responsible for the risks associated with the use of his/her login and password, where applicable.
Any User's password must remain secret. In the event of disclosure of the password, the Publisher declines all responsibility.
Users assume full responsibility for their use of the information and content on the www.companyviene.com website.

By publishing on the site, the User grants CompanyViene the non-exclusive and free right, valid throughout the world, to reproduce, represent, adapt, modify, broadcast and distribute his/her publication, either directly or through an authorised third party.

sections.title: Responsibility of the Publisher
content: CompanyViene cannot be held responsible for any malfunction of the server or the network.
Similarly, the site cannot be held liable in the event of force majeure or the unforeseeable and insurmountable act of a third party.
The www.companyviene.com website undertakes to use all necessary means to guarantee the security and confidentiality of data. However, it does not guarantee total security.
CompanyViene reserves the right not to guarantee the reliability of sources, although the information published on the site is deemed reliable.

sections.title: Intellectual property
content: The www.companyviene.com website and all of its content, including texts, still or animated images, videos, databases, programmes, logos, trademarks, etc., are protected by property rights or licences granted to CompanyViene.

Subject to the exceptions provided for in the regulations relating to intellectual property and without the prior written authorisation of CompanyViene or the holder of the rights concerned, any reproduction by CompanyViene, any communication, representation, adaptation, translation, transformation, incorporation, commercialisation and/or transfer, in part or in full, to another site of one or more of the aforementioned elements, by any process and on any medium whatsoever, is strictly prohibited.
Any unauthorised use of the content of this site constitutes an infringement of copyright and is liable to prosecution.

sections.title: Personal data
content: The personal data policy is drawn up in accordance with the applicable regulations.

sections.title: Hypertext links
content: CompanyViene is not responsible for the domains to which the hypertext links on the site lead and has no control over these links.

sections.title: Changes to the general terms and conditions of use
content: The www.companyviene.com website reserves the right to modify the clauses of these general terms and conditions of use at any time and without justification.

sections.title: Applicable law and competent courts
content: The content and services appearing on the www.companyviene.com site are intended exclusively for users residing in the countries where CompanyViene provides its services, and only the law of those countries is applicable; any disputes will be settled by the courts and tribunals of the countries concerned.
